short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make tab indented code more readable by allowing you to set a custom tab size

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set custom tab size for code view on GitHub.com. The tab size setting is synced across all Chrome browsers you're logged into.
